chunk:
Bee Naturals Micellar Cleansing Water

Brand: Bee Naturals

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Purified water, triglycerides, vegetable glycerin, hydrogenated castor oil, honey, decyl polyglucose, phenoxyethanol, sorbic acid, ascorbic acid, licorice extract, feverfew extract

Ingredients: Purified water, triglycerides, vegetable glycerin, hydrogenated castor oil, honey, decyl polyglucose, phenoxyethanol, sorbic acid, ascorbic acid, licorice extract, feverfew extract

Directions: Just mist the face and neck and simply remove with cotton pads or warm face cloth. There is no need to rinse!

Directions: Just mist the face and neck and simply remove with cotton pads or warm face cloth. There is no need to rinse!

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer
